revised_title: Ethyl Nitrate Flame Decomposition: A Study of Reaction Zones and Products
tldr: The authors studied the flame decomposition of ethyl nitrate and stabilized the flame at atmospheric pressure to observe the reaction zones and products. They used infra-red absorption spectrometry and chemical methods to analyze the gas samples extracted from the flame. The findings provide insights into the ignition and combustion mechanisms of ethyl nitrate and other complex nitric esters.
